Tewfik Saleh bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede nke Ijipt
A na-edekwaaha ya dị ka Tawfik Saleh na Tewfiq Salah.
A mụrụ Saleh na 27 Ọktoba 1926, na Alexandria
Ọ bụ ezie na nna ya megidere mmasị ya n'ime ihe nkiri, ọ ka na-ewere ihe nkiri dị ka nnukwu mmasị ya
N'afọ 1949, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Victoria College of Alexandria Ọ nwụrụ na 18 Ọgọst 2013 na Cairo.
Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Fools' Alley (1955), nke Naguib Mahfouz dere
Ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Struggle of the Heroes (Sirâńel abtâl) (1962) na The Rebels (el Moutamarridoun) (1968) n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
